mapper.select: select * from orders where userId=#{userId} and state between 2 and 7
mapper.update: update orders set state=state + 8 where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into orders(orderNum, userId, trainNo, startNo, stopNo, passId, state, oTime) values(#{orderNum}, #{userId}, #{trainNo}, #{startNo}, #{stopNo}, #{passId}, #{state}, now())
